comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: 17 photos of other boxers of the era by Kent Photo, of Sydney, Australia are online at the National Library of Australia's Trove site: trove.nla.gov.au/picture/result?q=creator%3A%22Kent+Photo%22 14 more are catalogued under Milton C. Kent: catalogue.nla.gov.au/Search/Home?lookfor=author:%22Kent%2...
